features.featureTitle: On the Admin page (`frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx`), inside the management UI (visible after successful login), display the full current `/admin` URL as a copyable text element. Derive the URL dynamically using `window.location.origin + '/admin'`. Render it in a styled read-only input or code block accompanied by a 'Copy' button that copies the URL to the clipboard via the Clipboard API and shows a brief 'Copied!' confirmation feedback (e.g. for 2 seconds). This element should be clearly labelled, e.g. 'Admin URL'.
